task.title: How to Multiply Numbers?
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the multiplication feature of JPS Calculator App

prereq.p: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is multiplicaton.

result.p: The result from the multiplication is displayed.

example.p: You want to multiply 2 and 3. The equation will look like 2*3=6. You enter 2. Press multiply. Enter 3. Press equals.
The result 6 will appear on the screen.
